support.title: INTERNATIONAL SUPPORT
support.subtitle: Brief description of what MLC is, its role and functions (concise but comprehensively on point)
support.description: Mahardhika Learning Center (MLC) is an official training and workshop center affiliated with STIE Mahardhika Surabaya, offering training, workshops, webinars, as well as online/hybrid classes. MLC is the learning destination of choice, specifically for STIE Mahardhika students and the general public, for skill development

certified.description: Build global connections with <0>50+ national and international institutions across 11 countries.</0> Get publication opportunities and ISBN-registered book publishing, as well as unlimited access to international professional and academic networks to strengthen your position as a future global leader. STIE Mahardhika's Doctor of Management Science Program opens access to the world of research, cross-cultural collaboration, and prestigious international certifications:
